VeryRareMagicItems.Name: Abracadabrus
VeryRareMagicItems.Description: This mysterious item has a variety of magical effects, but its true nature is unpredictable.

VeryRareMagicItems.Name: Absorbing Tattoo
VeryRareMagicItems.Description: This tattoo absorbs and stores spells cast at the wearer, which can be later released.

VeryRareMagicItems.Name: All-Purpose Tool
VeryRareMagicItems.Description: This versatile tool can transform into various forms to serve a wide range of functions.

VeryRareMagicItems.Name: Amethyst Lodestone
VeryRareMagicItems.Description: This lodestone provides guidance and divination when attuned to it.

VeryRareMagicItems.Name: Ammunition, +1, +2, or +3
VeryRareMagicItems.Description: This ammunition enhances the damage of ranged weapons when used.

VeryRareMagicItems.Name: Amulet of the Black Skull
VeryRareMagicItems.Description: This amulet grants dark powers and necromantic abilities to the wearer.

VeryRareMagicItems.Name: Amulet of the Devout
VeryRareMagicItems.Description: This amulet enhances the wearer's devotion and grants divine blessings.

VeryRareMagicItems.Name: Amulet of the Planes
VeryRareMagicItems.Description: This amulet allows the wearer to travel between different planes of existence.

VeryRareMagicItems.Name: Animated Shield
VeryRareMagicItems.Description: This shield can move and defend its wearer even without their input.

VeryRareMagicItems.Name: Arcane Cannon
VeryRareMagicItems.Description: This magical cannon can launch destructive energy projectiles.

VeryRareMagicItems.Name: Arcane Grimoire
VeryRareMagicItems.Description: This grimoire contains a wealth of arcane knowledge and spells.

VeryRareMagicItems.Name: Arcane Propulsion Arm
VeryRareMagicItems.Description: This mechanical arm grants its user enhanced mobility and combat abilities.

VeryRareMagicItems.Name: Armor, +1, +2, or +3
VeryRareMagicItems.Description: This magical armor provides increased protection and reduces the wearer's vulnerability to attacks.

VeryRareMagicItems.Name: Arrow of Slaying
VeryRareMagicItems.Description: This arrow is specially designed to slay a particular type of creature.

VeryRareMagicItems.Name: Bag of Devouring
VeryRareMagicItems.Description: This bag has an insatiable hunger and can consume objects placed inside it.

VeryRareMagicItems.Name: Barrier Tattoo
VeryRareMagicItems.Description: This tattoo creates a protective barrier around the wearer when activated.

VeryRareMagicItems.Name: Battle Standard of Infernal Power
VeryRareMagicItems.Description: This banner grants infernal powers and commands over demons to its bearer.

VeryRareMagicItems.Name: Belt of Giant Strength
VeryRareMagicItems.Description: This belt enhances the wearer's strength to that of a giant.

VeryRareMagicItems.Name: Blade of the Medusa
VeryRareMagicItems.Description: This blade can petrify foes with its gaze and transform them into stone.

VeryRareMagicItems.Name: Bloodaxe
VeryRareMagicItems.Description: This axe is fueled by the blood of its foes and can channel their life force.

VeryRareMagicItems.Name: Bloodwell Vial
VeryRareMagicItems.Description: This vial contains a pool of blood that can heal and strengthen its user when consumed.

VeryRareMagicItems.Name: Bobbing Lily Pad
VeryRareMagicItems.Description: This lily pad grants the ability to walk on water and provides a place to rest upon any body of water.

VeryRareMagicItems.Name: Bracelet of Rock Magic
VeryRareMagicItems.Description: This bracelet can manipulate and control earth and stone with its wearer's will.

VeryRareMagicItems.Name: Candle of Invocation
VeryRareMagicItems.Description: This candle can be used to invoke powerful beings and request their aid.

VeryRareMagicItems.Name: Carpet of Flying
VeryRareMagicItems.Description: This flying carpet allows the user to soar through the air at will.

VeryRareMagicItems.Name: Cauldron of Rebirth
VeryRareMagicItems.Description: This cauldron can resurrect the dead and restore life to fallen creatures.

VeryRareMagicItems.Name: Chronolometer
VeryRareMagicItems.Description: This timekeeping device allows the user to manipulate time and glimpse into the future.

VeryRareMagicItems.Name: Cloak of Arachnida
VeryRareMagicItems.Description: This cloak grants the wearer spider-like abilities and control over arachnids.

VeryRareMagicItems.Name: Conch of Teleportation
VeryRareMagicItems.Description: This conch can be blown to instantly transport the user to a known location.

VeryRareMagicItems.Name: Constantori's Portrait
VeryRareMagicItems.Description: This magical portrait allows communication with its depicted subject, even across great distances.

VeryRareMagicItems.Name: Crystal Ball
VeryRareMagicItems.Description: This crystal ball can be used for scrying and divination.

VeryRareMagicItems.Name: Crystalline Chronicle

VeryRareMagicItems.Name: Dancing Sword
VeryRareMagicItems.Description: This sword can dance and attack foes on its own when commanded.

VeryRareMagicItems.Name: Devastation Orb

VeryRareMagicItems.Name: Dimensional Loop
VeryRareMagicItems.Description: This loop allows the wearer to manipulate and traverse through different dimensions.

VeryRareMagicItems.Name: Dispelling Stone

VeryRareMagicItems.Name: Dragon Vessel

VeryRareMagicItems.Name: Dragonhide Belt

VeryRareMagicItems.Name: Dwarven Thrower

VeryRareMagicItems.Name: Dyrrn's Tentacle Whip

VeryRareMagicItems.Name: Efreeti Bottle

VeryRareMagicItems.Name: Eldritch Staff
VeryRareMagicItems.Description: This staff channels eldritch energies and enhances spellcasting.

VeryRareMagicItems.Name: Ghost Step Tattoo

VeryRareMagicItems.Name: Helm of Brilliance

VeryRareMagicItems.Name: Ioun Stone

VeryRareMagicItems.Name: Potion of Speed

VeryRareMagicItems.Name: Sword of the Paruns
